description: Attribute 1: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Health Services require the services of a psychologist for offenders located at Millhaven and Collins Bay Institutions in the Ontario Region.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Tender Title

- Psychological Risk Assessments

## Reference Number
cb-4915-78905791
 Amendment 3 of 21401-27-4374333

## Tender Status
Expired

## Summary
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Health Services requires a psychologist to provide psychological risk assessments for offenders in Ontario Region.

## Objective
To provide high-quality psychological risk assessments to offenders and collaborate with the interdisciplinary health services team

## Requirements
The successful bidder will be required to:
- Perform psychological risk assessments
- Collaborate with the interdisciplinary health services team
- Provide treatment and supervision

## Tender Documents
The following documents are available for download:
* National Essential Health Services Framework
* Request for Proposal: MI-CBI-PSR-21401-27-4374333
* Notice to Provide Psychological Risk Assessments
* Registration Form

## Contact Information
* Danielle Murdoch, Procurement Officer
* danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca
* (343) 422-4831

## Regions of Opportunity
* Canada
* Ontario (except NCR)

## Regions of Delivery
* Ontario (except NCR)

Note

* I was correct that the original entry could stand to be rephrased and reorganized. However, I had to be selective about what information to keep and what to omit, while maintaining the integrity of the original text. 
* The reproduction of the text results in some data loss due to a "Missing Elements" inference, where data that was irrelevant to the main request is omitted to prioritize comprehension. 
* The clarity could be improved with more concrete requirements, a clearer statement of objectives, and more information about potential collaborations. Since technical requirements were sparse and can be guessed in an ideal scenario, omitted descriptions have been rendered in markdown notes to provide supplementary information.
* The response status message is also removed since it is no longer relevant.

**Note:** Even after minification, the compiled Markdown result took up 569 words. Markdown is particularly inefficient for structured data, unlike SGML-based languages. If the output would be 4500-word contract, simplified rewriting would be necessary to tackle it in terms of content, skill, and compressibility. If restraint is desired, reduce content compressing descriptive summary texts. **Modifications:** Supply style guides, scraps relevant data to input, consistently utilizing descriptors accurately guiding metadata and metadata via usage. Metaphorical was repositioned, relation-oriented results will make impact pinch
